channel.title: Shockwave
channel.description:
As many of you know, I'm a Christian. And it would be crazy to think that as a Christian I wouldn't listen to Christian music. So, of course I do, but I don't listen to fucking like "Oh jesus i want to jump in your bed." or any shit like that.
I mean, on occasion I do, but this topic isn't about that. It's about the Hardcore band Shockwave. They're in the Hardcore genre, and they sound pretty awesome. I didn't used to like Hardcore, or punk rock or anything of that sort. I used to listen to like Death Metal, Black Metal, etc. But a friend of mine got me to listen to these guys, and they're pretty awesome, not because they're Christian, most of the time Christian groups who try to get into these genres are shunned, and are criticized. But just as a Hardcore group, and not even as a Christian Hardcore group, they're really good.
I listen to Secular music, in fact most of my music is Secular. So I know what good music sounds like. As I'm sure you all do as well. Everyone has their own taste in music, so you know, if you don't like it you don't have to flame the shit out of me about it.
http://music.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=music.artistalbums&artistid=7342900&albumid=8276486

item.title: Shockwave
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:10, topic:278431”][quote author=XharveyX link=topic=367460.msg2790742#msg2790742 date=1242752822]
I was just saying, why should people care anyway if they are christian?

and the only reason i said i was a christian then aethiest because im meant to be a christian because the rest of my family are.
[/quote]
mate it could be worse if they were all hindu you would already be married by now ;)[/quote]

Haha fair point

Read full topic

The subject was not about the Christian Faith. It was about a band that happens to be based on Christian Principles. No derailing this topic.
